alert.note: Alert for Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 06 at 2:10AM MST until January 07 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 5 PM MST SUNDAY ABOVE 3500 FEET... * WHAT...Periods of snow expected. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph, causing blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Areas above 3500 feet near Camp Verde, Chino Valley, Congress, Cottonwood, Paulden and Tuba City. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 5 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. Snow forecast from 2 AM Sunday to 5 PM Sunday: Camp Verde 0 to 1 inches Chino Valley 1 to 3 inches Congress 0 inches Cottonwood 0 to 1 inches Paulden 1 to 3 inches Tuba City 0 to 1 inches .
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins
